name: Adapt New Strategies
text: Own 2 faction technologies. 'Valefar Assimilator' technologies do not count toward this objective.

name: Become the Gatekeeper
text: Have 1 or more ships in a system that contains an alpha wormhole and 1 or more ships in a system that contains a beta wormhole. [Note: this can be fulfilled with just 1 system if it has both types of wormholes]

name: Control the Region
text: Have 1 or more ships in 6 systems.

name: Cut Supply Lines
text: Have 1 or more ships in the same system as another player's space dock.

name: Destroy their Greatest Ship
text: Destroy another player's war sun or flagship.

name: Establish a Perimeter
text: Have 4 PDS units on the game board.

name: Forge an Alliance
text: Control 4 cultural planets.

name: Form a Spy Network
text: Discard 5 action cards.

name: Fuel the War Machine
text: Have 3 space docks on the game board.

name: Gather a Mighty Fleet
text: Have 5 dreadnoughts on the game board.

name: Learn the Secrets of the Cosmos
text: Have 1 or more ships in 3 systems that are each adjacent to an anomaly.

name: Make an Example of their World
text: Destroy the last of a player's ground forces on a planet during the bombardment step.

name: Master the Laws of Physics
text: Own 4 technologies of the same color.

name: Mine Rare Metals
text: Control 4 hazardous planets.

name: Monopolize Production
text: Control 4 industrial planets.

name: Occupy the Seat of the Empire
text: Control Mecatol Rex and have 3 or more ships in its system.

name: Spark a Rebellion
text: Win a combat against a player who has the most victory points.

name: Threaten Enemies
text: Have 1 or more ships in a system that is adjacent to another player's home system.

name: Turn Their Fleets to Dust
text: Destroy the last of a player's non-fighter ships in the active system during the space cannon offense step.

name: Unveil Flagship
text: Win a space combat in a system that contains your flagship. You cannot score this objective if your flagship is destroyed in the combat.

name: Become a Martyr
text: Lose control of a planet in a home system.

name: Betray a Friend
text: Win a combat against a player whose promissory note you had in your play area at the start of your tactical action. [Note: In your play area is not the same as in your hand. Only Alliances, Supports, and some faction specific notes will go into the play area. Titans PN counts for this.]

name: Brave the Void
text: Win a combat in an anomaly.

name: Darken the Skies
text: Win a combat in another player's home system.

name: Defy Space and Time
text: Have units in the wormhole nexus.

name: Demonstrate Your Power
text: Have 3 or more non-fighter ships in the active system at the end of a space combat.

name: Destroy Heretical Works
text: Purge 2 of your relic fragments of any type.

name: Dictate Policy
text: There are 3 or more laws in play.

name: Drive the Debate
text: You or a planet you control are elected by an agenda.

name: Establish Hegemony
text: Control planets that have a combined influence value of at least 12.

name: Fight with Precision
text: Destroy the last of a player's fighters in the active system during the anti-fighter barrage step.

name: Foster Cohesion
text: Be neighbors with all other players.

name: Hoard Raw Materials
text: Control planets that have a combined resource value of at least 12.

name: Mechanize the Military
text: Have 1 mech on each of 4 planets.

name: Occupy the Fringe
text: Have 9 or more ground forces on a planet that does not contain 1 of your space docks.

name: Produce en Masse
text: Have units with a combined Production value of at least 8 in a single system. [Note: Production value is not related to the value or number of ships in the system. Production value is how much you could produce if you activated that system; it's represented by a gear icon number in async]

name: Prove Endurance
text: Be the last player to pass during a game round.

name: Seize an Icon
text: Control a legendary planet.

name: Stake Your Claim
text: Control a planet in a system that contains a planet controlled by another player.

name: Strengthen Bonds
text: Have another player's promissory note in your play area. [Note: In your play area is not the same as in your hand. Only Alliances, Supports, and some faction specific notes will go into the play area. Titans PN counts for this. Shares a name with an async podcast]

name: Seize an Icon
text: Gain control of another player's legendary planet.

name: Assemble A Speedy fleet
text: Have 8 cruisers on the game board and own the cruiser 2 technology.

name: Promote Peace
text: Return 4 of your non-fighter ships and 6 of your ground forces from systems adjaenct to other players' units to your reinforcments.

name: Ambush Their Fleets
text: Win a combat in a system that contains your opponent's command token.

name: Accept Bribes
text: Receive 3 or more trade goods to either play or not play your strategy card.

name: Gather a Legion
text: Have 16 infantry on the game board.

name: Clear the Way
text: Win a combat in a system that does not contain planets.

name: Sponsor Data Archives
text: Control 3 planets that have technology specialties.

name: Secure a Path
text: Have ships in a path of adjacent systems starting in your home system and ending in Mecatol Rex's system.

name: Repair and Recommission
text: Have 4 damaged units on the board.

name: Rule a Diverse Empire
text: Control 2 cultural, 2 hazardous, and 2 industrial planets.

name: Deep Space Research
text: Have units in 3 different types of anomalies.

name: Leave No Survivors
text: Destroy the last of a player's ships in combat after they have declared a retreat

name: Spare No Munitions
text: After your opponent assigns hits, have 3 hits left unassigned.

name: Burn their Shipyards
text: Win a ground combat on another player's planet that contains a space dock.

name: Form the Heart of a New Empire
text: Control a planet in a system that is adjacent to 5 systems that contain your units.

name: Rebel Against Political Elites
text: Win a combat against a player that owns an elect player law.

name: Meet Your Neighbors
text: Have 1 or more ships in 3 systems that are each adjacent to a different player's home system.

name: Demilitirize the Nation
text: Have no command tokens in your fleet token.

name: Really Learn the Secrets of the Cosmos
text: Have 1 or more ships in 5 systems that are each adjacent to an anomaly.

name: Construction Entusiast
text: Have 3 structures in 1 system.

name: Corner Your Enemies
text: Win a space combat during which your opponent never had an eligible system to retreat to.

name: Check and Balance
text: Win a combat against the speaker.

name: Fight with Precision
text: Use Anti-Fighter Barrage to destroy the last of a player's fighters in a system.

name: Destroy A Masterpiece
text: Purge a relic.

name: Deal in Obligations
text: Reveal 3 promissory notes from your hand that originally belonged to other players.

name: Wormhole Artillery
text: Destroy a ship through a wormhole with a unit that has the deep space cannon ability.

name: Win the People's Favor
text: At the start of the agenda phase, Have more votes than any other player.

name: Gather Abundance
text: Control 5 planets outside of your home system that each have a resource value of 2 or higher.

name: Prove Intense Endurance
text: Be the last player to pass during a game round.

name: Trade Conduit
text: Pass Trade Goods between players that are not neighbors.

name: Command a Diverse Fleet
text: Have 5 different types of non-fighter ships in a system.

name: Save the Homeland
text: Win a ground combat in your home system.

name: Leverage Your Soft Power
text: Have 2 or less promissory notes in your hand.

name: Construct Transport Network
text: Have a carrier in each of 4 systems.

name: Conspire with Patience
text: Gain control of a planet controlled by a player who has passed

name: Punish the Weak
text: Win a combat against a player with the least victory points.

name: Lure Them In
text: Have no ships in your home system while another player has ground forces in a system adjacent to your home system.

name: Lone Survivor
text: Have only 1 remaining unit in a system after combat.

name: Core Expedition
text: Have non-fighter ships in 2 of the 3 Galactic Core Gravity Rift systems.

name: Spread your Wings
text: Have ships in 5 systems that are not adjacent to each other or your home system.

name: Alphabet Squadron
text: Have a Fighter, Destroyer, Carrier, Cruiser, and Dreadnought in a single system.

name: Mercy For The Weak
text: Win a Space combat in a system with a planet owned by another playerand that has no ground forces , in which you do not commit any ground forces to that planet.

name: Exterminate an Enemy
text: Gain control of another player's last planet.

name: Reclaim Ancient Monuments
text: Control 2 planets that have attachments.

name: Invest in Infrastructure
text: Own a space dock unit upgrade.

name: Prosecute Heretics
text: Win a combat against a player with the most relics (at least 1).

name: Strike a Handsome Deal
text: Give or receive at leaset 4 trade goods as part of a transaction with another player.

name: Expand Borders (for real)
text: Control planets in 4 systems that are not adjacent to each other or your home system.

name: A Worthy Sacrifice
text: Have 2 of your non-fighter ships destroyed when attempting to move through/exit a gravity rift in a single tactical action.

name: Diversify Research
text: Own 1 technology that you did not own at the start of the game in each color.

name: Preserve Your Investments
text: Complete a retreat with no sustained ships.

name: Bypass Their Defenses
text: Win a ground combat on a planet that contains a PDS.

name: Learn from Others
text: Fulfill the requirements to score 2 secret objectives that have been scored by other players.

name: Galvanize the People
text: Exhaust 1 planet of each trait.

name: Field Test Advancements
text: Win a combat in which 2 of your surviving unitsare of different unit types whose unit upgrades you own.

name: Come. See. Conquer.
text: Win more than 1 ground combat in a single tactical action.

name: Warning Shots
text: Have 2 PDS units fire on enemy units and land no hits.

name: Form a Contact Network
text: Control 5 planets outside of your home system that each have an influence value of 2 or higher.

name: Foster (as much) Cohesion (as possible)
text: Be neighbors with 12 other players.

name: Indebt Your Leadership
text: Have no promissory notes in your hand.

name: Converge Forces
text: Have at least 5 command tokens in your fleet pool and move ships from 5 different systems into 1 containing another player's ships.

name: Overrrun Defenses
text: Win a ground combat on a planet that contained another player's PDS at the start of the Combat.

name: Multiple Allegiances
text: Have promissory notes from 3 or more other players in play your area.

name: Assemble a Swarm
text: Have 20 fighters on the game board.

name: Establish a New Home
text: Control a Non-home planet with 2 or more structures on it.

name: Make Many Enemies
text: Win a ground combat against player X in a system where you won a space combat against player Y in the same tactical action.

name: Incorporate Legends in Your History
text: Control 2 legendary planets.

name: Watch the World Burn
text: Participate in a space combat where no ships survived (on either side).
